description: Default service descriptions for mobile detailing tenants (informational only, no pricing)

services.title: Auto Detailing
services.shortDescription: Complete interior and exterior detailing service
services.description: Professional mobile auto detailing service that brings the detail shop to your location. Complete interior and exterior service focused on deep cleaning, decontamination, and entry-level protection.
benefits: Removes bonded contaminants (rail dust, overspray, brake fallout)
Restores gloss and clarity with safe wash and clay process
Water spot removal and paint decontamination

services.title: Paint Correction
services.shortDescription: Multi-stage paint polishing to remove defects
services.description: Professional paint correction removes swirl marks, scratches, oxidation, and other paint defects. Our multi-stage machine polishing process restores depth, clarity, and a mirror-like finish.
benefits: Removes swirl marks and light scratches
Essential prep for ceramic coating or PPF

services.title: Ceramic Coating
services.description: Professional-grade ceramic coating provides long-lasting protection with enhanced gloss, hydrophobic properties, and easier maintenance. Bonds permanently to paint, creating a sacrificial layer that protects against environmental damage.

services.title: Paint Protection Film (PPF)
services.description: Premium paint protection film (PPF) provides the ultimate defense against rock chips, scratches, and road debris. Self-healing technology repairs minor scratches with heat, while maintaining your vehicle's factory finish.
benefits: Protection against rock chips and road debris
Maintains factory finish and resale value
Available in gloss or matte finish

services.title: Marine Detailing
services.description: Specialized detailing services for boats and marine vessels. We understand the unique challenges of saltwater, UV exposure, and marine environments, using products and techniques designed specifically for watercraft.

services.title: RV Detailing
services.description: Comprehensive mobile detailing for RVs, motorhomes, and travel trailers. From exterior washing and oxidation removal to interior deep cleaning, we handle the unique requirements of these larger vehicles.
